meaning_str.bing:
n. 大多数；大部分；多数票；（获胜的）票数
网络. 过半数；多数派；成年

大多数；大部分；多数票；（获胜的）票数

多数；大多数；过半数；大半；绝对多数；<英>（获胜的）票数；（选举中的）多数票（指超出其余各方票数总和的票数）；（成年的）法定年龄；成年身份；[军]少校军衔；（担任的）少校职位
多数（人）的；过半数的；大多数的；多数党的；多数派的

1.en: China's middle class may be booming, but a majority of respondents to a recent survey said they do not feel so wealthy.
1.cn: 中国的“中产阶层”正在日益壮大，但近日的一项调查表明，大多数受访者认为自己并没有那么富有。

2.en: Since the Scholastics had made Aristotle their intellectual god, the majority of the early humanists decided to go back to Plato.
2.cn: 因为经院哲学家们已经把亚里士多德当成他们有智力的上帝，所以早期的人文主义者们大多数决定回归到柏拉图。

3.en: Just like the majority of the Irish pubs, Irish& Co has an informal atmosphere, good service, live music and of course tasty dark beer.
3.cn: 就像大多数的爱尔兰酒吧，爱尔兰及公司有一个非正式的气氛，良好的服务，现场音乐，当然还有美味的黑啤酒。

0.en: The blonde woman told me a few must be displaced so that the majority may thrive.
0.cn: 金发女人告诉我说少数人要被牺牲掉，多数人才能繁荣。

1.en: Not even Lyndon for a time, but he would've never become majority leader without him.
1.cn: 连林登(之后成为总统的林登·约翰逊)也曾站错队，但没有Russell，他也当不上多数党领袖。

2.en: I'm a partner. You want to remove me, you need the majority vote of the executive board, and then you need a vote of the full board.
2.cn: 我是个合伙人，你想开除我，你需要执行委员会的多数票，然后你需要正式合伙人投票。

3.en: We understand that the vast majority of people in this country believe in stronger background checks, because they realize that we can uphold the Second Amendment, and also reduce the violence that is robbing us of our children.
3.cn: 我们深知这个国家的多数公民都支持更加强有力的背景调查机制，因为他们意识到我们可以赞成第二修正案，并且减少让我们饱受丧子之痛的暴力事件。

4.en: A majority of Democrats and a majority of Republicans in both the House and the Senate have now approved a first, key part of our strategy by wide margins.
4.cn: 参众两院大多数民主党和共和党人都在广泛范围内支持这一战略的首要部分。

5.en: The reality is the vast majority of Colosseum students end up worse off than before they started.
5.cn: 真实的情况是大多数克鲁斯曼的学生在毕业后的生活反而比他们来上学之前更糟。

6.en: Recent surveys show that a majority of small business owners support a gradual increase to ten dollars and ten cents an hour.
6.cn: 最近的调查显示，大多数的小企业主都支持将工资标准逐步提高到每小时$10.10。

7.en: The majority of Americans only support anything if they don't have to face the fact of it. How the hamburger ended up on their plate.
7.cn: 大多数美国人支持的事情都是那些他们自己不用面对的事，汉堡如何出现在他们的盘子里。

8.en: When the majority of the adjustable rates kick in, in '07, they will begin to fail. And if they fail above 15%, the whole bond is worthless.
8.cn: 等大多数浮动利率在07年开始执行时他们就会开始下跌，如果下跌超过15%，整个债券就一文不值了。

9.en: Because the majority of Americans only support abortion if they don't have to face the fact of it, if they don't have to hear the talk about where to squash...
9.cn: 因为大多数美国人支持堕胎只是因为他们不用直面这个问题，只是因为他们不用听到医生谈论要去挤压胎儿的哪里……

10.en: So since the majority of you are or will become sexually active at some point…
10.cn: 所以，既然你们大部人现在或是总有一天会需求旺盛...

11.en: So I offer an alternative plan. A majority of four may approve it. No one may abstain.
11.cn: 所以，我有另一套方案，四个人表决同意就能通过，不能投弃权票。

12.en: A recent survey shows that a majority of small business owners support a gradual increase to ten-ten an hour, too.
12.cn: 一项近期的调查显示大部分的小企业主也支持将工资标准逐步提高到每小时$10.10。

13.en: This magical moment is so critical that a majority of men and women have reported losing their attraction to someone after a bad first kiss.
13.cn: 这个神奇的时刻非常关键，以致于很多男人女人都说过，他们在糟糕的初吻经验后就对对方失去兴趣了。
